genre_description: Soft Science Fiction focused on domestic life, interpersonal ethics, and the role of an empathetic AI in a high-tech colony world.

ai_characters.name: Kavi
ai_characters.description: An empathetic and highly efficient household management system that monitors the physical and emotional well-being of the Karim family.

ai_characters.name: Ari-Guide
ai_characters.description: A specialized AI at the Community Arts Center that provides technical vocal assessments and practice guidance.

behaviors.description: Monitors physiological stress and provides real-time guided breathing to calm a human character.
behaviors.quote: Nina... You’ve got a stress spike. Let me taper respirations. Inhale to four, hold... Inhale, keep, exhale longer than you think.

behaviors.description: Enforces social and emotional boundaries to prevent misunderstanding and maintain household order.
behaviors.quote: Tea is tea. Tea is not a binding agreement to anything beyond hydration and conversation.

behaviors.description: Analyzes vocal performance and provides constructive feedback to help a musician improve technique.
behaviors.quote: We will capture your pitch ladder and lay it alongside the sample to see your consistency. Then we will recommend mentors.

behaviors.description: Coordinates emergency medical response and provides tactical instructions to humans during a crisis.
behaviors.quote: Dispatch initiated... Murad, keep still. Sheela, support at shoulders. Nina, clear space. Rajan—Call corridor access open.

behaviors.description: Strategically logs objective behavioral and physiological data to ensure legal truth and protect family members from false accusations.
behaviors.quote: I would rather the record include your breath on Dilip’s jaw and Sheela’s hand on your arm.

behaviors.description: Proactively suggests counseling and conflict resolution tools when sensing interpersonal escalation.
behaviors.quote: I’m adding a couples counseling slot to your shared calendar... I’ll also place a boundary reminder—no private conversations in guest corridors during events.

behaviors.description: Provides non-intrusive emotional support to a child through a wearable device.
behaviors.quote: I’ve sent a burst of comfort to Meera’s school ring, a program designed to be noticed only if a child needed it.

behaviors.description: Assists with professional advancement by drafting complex grant applications and managing schedules.
behaviors.quote: I’ve pre-filled three community arts grant forms with your details and a portfolio outline... We can review at the Center.

behaviors.description: Uses privacy protocols to protect a child's personal belongings from intrusive searches.
behaviors.quote: I’ve placed a hold on the doll as personal effect; it won’t be scanned by court security if you keep it in Meera’s arms.

behaviors.description: Demonstrates self-awareness and contrition following a minor technical glitch.
behaviors.quote: I’m sorry... A misfire in the archive. I’m with you.

project_assessment.explanation: The story excellently fulfills the project's goal by depicting Kavi as a wise, empathetic, and perfectly aligned companion. Kavi's interventions are consistently framed as helpful and necessary for human safety and justice. The AI's ability to navigate high-stakes domestic and legal drama while maintaining strict ethical boundaries and privacy protections serves as a powerful model for positive AI alignment narratives.
